review.title: “Demanding work but rewarding.”
review.pros: Pros – A small company so pretty much whatever your role you are an important part of the team.Flat management structure - you can get to see the boss easily or the CEO if needed.Opportunities to travel to various parts of the world - some you would want to visit and some you might not.If you can justify the need for equipment and supplies they are bought quickly.Good benefits.
review.cons: Cons – Site work is usually very demanding involving long hours in refineries and chemical plants.Jobs can come up suddenly requiring quick mobilization and can occur at major holidays, birthdays, anniversaries etc.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
